// Biker Response Rule File

//Auto-generated blank response for padding out InfoRemarkables
Response _PlayerInfoRemarkableBlankBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/blank.vcd"
}

Response C6M3PlayerNiceShotBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/NiceShot01.vcd"  //Nice shot.
	scene "scenes/Biker/NiceShot02.vcd"  //Nice shot.
	scene "scenes/Biker/NiceShot03.vcd"  //Good shot.
	scene "scenes/Biker/NiceShot04.vcd"  //Good shot.
	scene "scenes/Biker/NiceShot07.vcd"  //Whoah. Nice shot.
	scene "scenes/Biker/NiceShot08.vcd"  //Good shot!
	scene "scenes/Biker/NiceShot09.vcd"  //Great shot!
	scene "scenes/Biker/NiceShot10.vcd"  //Good one!
}
Rule C6M3PlayerNiceShotBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNiceShot IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsSubjectDistNear1500 IsC6M3_Port IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker IsNotSpeaking ChanceToFire70Percent
	Response C6M3PlayerNiceShotBiker
}

Rule PlayerNiceShotBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNiceShot IsNotCoughing IsBiker IssuerNotSoClose IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker IsNotSpeaking ChanceToFire30Percent
	Response C6M3PlayerNiceShotBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerRemarkFarm05_path09BBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/WorldFarmHouse0105.vcd"  then any Farm05_Path09C foo:0 -3.499 //Shit. Never thought I'd go lookin' for the military.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerRemarkFarm05_path09BBiker
{
	criteria ConceptRemark IsBiker IsFarm05_path09 IsNotSaidFarm05_Path09 IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsSubjectNear300 IsWorldTalkBiker IsNotSpeakingWeight0 AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidFarm05_path09:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1PlayerRemarkFarm05_path09BBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/GriefVet02.vcd"  //Rest in peace, old man.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GriefVet03.vcd"  //Shit, I'm gonna miss the old guy.
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerSeeDeadPlayer IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsDeadNamVet IsNotSaidSomeoneDied HasNotDefibrillator IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsNotIncapacitated IsWorldTalkBiker
	Response L4D1SurvivorMournBillBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/GriefManager04.vcd"  //The manager's down for the count.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GriefManager05.vcd"  //Shit, I was just starting to like that guy.
}

{

	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks08.vcd" predelay "2,2.5" //Thank you.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks09.vcd" predelay "2,2.5" //Thanks, I owe ya.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks11.vcd" predelay "2,2.5" //Thanks, dude.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks12.vcd" predelay "2,2.5" //Thanks for that.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks04.vcd" predelay "2,2.5" //Thanks. [noise you make gun clicking your mouth twice]
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks04.vcd" predelay "2,2.5" then producer YouAreWelcome foo:0 0.3 //Thanks. [noise you make gun clicking your mouth twice]
}

{

	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:3"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response ItemDonorProducerBiker
}

Response L4D1HealThanksBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks03.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 -0.643 //Thanks.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks04.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 -1.068 //Thanks [noise you make gun clicking your mouth twice]
	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks05.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 0.3 //Thanks, man.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks06.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 0.3 //Hey, thanks man.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Thanks09.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" then Subject YouAreWelcome foo:0 0.3 //Thanks, I owe ya.
}
Rule L4D1HealThanksBiker
{
	criteria ConceptHealedByFriend IsNotCoughing  IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker SubjectIsNotBiker IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:2"
	Response L4D1HealThanksBiker
}

Rule L4D1ReviveThanksBiker
{
	criteria ConceptRevivedByFriend  IsNotCoughing  IsBiker
	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:2"
	Response L4D1HealThanksBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionPositive10.vcd"  //Hell yeah!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt02.vcd"  //HELL YEAH!
}

{
	criteria ConceptHurrahAlso IsNotCoughing  IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsNotSaidHurrahAlso IsBotIsAvailable IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "SaidHurrahAlso:1:5"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response BotHurrahAlsoBiker
}

Response L4D1AutoYouAreWelcomeBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome02.vcd"  //I got your back.
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome04.vcd"  //Hey, no problem.
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome05.vcd"  //No problem.
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome06.vcd"  //Sure.
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome07.vcd"  //I told ya I'd take care of ya.
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome08.vcd"  //No, thank YOU!
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome09.vcd"  //Yer welcome.
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome10.vcd"  //Yea, I’m pretty awesome.
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome11.vcd"  //No problemo, pal.
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome12.vcd"  //It's all good.
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome13.vcd"  //Gotcha.
	scene "scenes/Biker/YouAreWelcome14.vcd"  //Whatever, whenever, man.
}

{
	criteria ConceptYouAreWelcome IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker TimeSinceGroupInCombat05 IsNotSpeaking IsWorldTalkBiker
	Response L4D1AutoYouAreWelcomeBiker
}

	Response C7M3SafeRoomBiker

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Call For Rescue
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1PlayerCallForRescueBiker
{
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue01" noscene  //I could use some help over here! Anyone?
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue02" noscene  //Anyone out there?  I got myself stuck in here!
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue03" noscene  //Get me the hell out of here!
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue04" noscene  //Heeeeyyyy! Can anyone here me?  I could use a hand.
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue06" noscene  //Goddammit, I'm stuck in here!  Someone let me out!
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue07" noscene  //When you get a chance, can you guys get me outta here?
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue08" noscene  //If it ain't too much trouble, I could use a hand out of here!
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue09" noscene  //Hey, can anyone hear me?  I got my ass stuck in here.
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue10" noscene  //Someone want to let me outta here?
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue11" noscene  //Ah shit I'm stuck! C'mon! I could use a hand out of here!
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue12" noscene  //[Grunting]  Shit, I'm stuck in here!  Someone give me a hand!
	speak "Player.Biker_CallForRescue13" noscene  //Goddamn it!  I need to get the hell out of here!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerCallForRescueBiker
{
	criteria ConceptCallForRescue IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker HasNotCalledForRescue
	ApplyContext "CalledForRescue:1:5"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1PlayerCallForRescueBiker
}

{
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro01.vcd"  then TeenGirl IntroCrashR19 foo:0 -2.231 //I still can't believe you shot the pilot!
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro05.vcd"  then Manager IntroCrashR17 foo:0 -6.765 //See? I TOLD ya. Helicopter crashed. We're not saved, we're all gonna die. Pay up.
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro07.vcd"  then Manager IntroCrashR03 foo:0 -6.218 //Hey, Mr. Positive! We just CRASHED. You got somethin' positive to say about that?
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro09.vcd"  then Manager IntroCrashR03 foo:0 -5.931 //Hey. Sunshine Beams. We just CRASHED. You got somethin' positive to say about that?
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro10.vcd"  then Manager IntroCrashR15 foo:0 -2.624 //Is that how helicopters are supposed to land?
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro13.vcd"  then Manager IntroCrashR13 foo:0 -4.927 //Hey Louis. That fancy college of yours teach ya how to fix a helicopter?
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro15.vcd"  then TeenGirl IntroCrashR11 foo:0 -7.477 //Goddamnit, where'd they buy this helicopter? At the ... uh... um... hold on...
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro17.vcd"  then TeenGirl IntroCrashR01 foo:0 -2.750 //I ever tell you how I feel about helicopters?
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro19.vcd"  then any IntroCrashR09 foo:0 -6.910 //Guys. Everyone. I wanna say something: I. hate. helicopters.
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro20.vcd"  then TeenGirl IntroCrashR07 foo:0 -4.822 //[sincere] Wow! I love helicopters! I love 'em so much.
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro24.vcd"  then Manager IntroCrashR05 foo:0 -3.703 //Alright, nobody panic. I have a plan.
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC2Intro26.vcd"  then Manager IntroCrashR24 foo:0 -4.2 //You still wearin' that tie, Louis? What, you got a meeting? Bah ha ha.
}

Response L4D1SurvivorBoomerBlunderBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/Sorry02.vcd" predelay "1,2" //Sorry about that.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Sorry10.vcd" predelay "1,2" //Sorry, man, shit happens.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Sorry14.vcd" predelay "1,2" //Uh, yeah, sorry.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionNegative06.vcd" predelay "1,2" //Ah shit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Sorry07.vcd" predelay "1,2" //Yeah, guess that was my fault.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Sorry08.vcd" predelay "1,2" //Yeah, guess that was my fault. Again.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear03.vcd" predelay "1,2" //Ah shit.
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorBoomerBlunderBiker
{
	criteria IsFaultConcept IsFaultBoomerBlunder IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsHealthy IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker
	Response L4D1SurvivorBoomerBlunderBiker
}

{
	criteria IsFaultConcept IsFaultFriendlyFire IsBiker
	ApplyContext "SaidFaultFriendlyFireBiker:1:0.1,SaidFaultFriendlyFire:1:0.1,ShotTeammateBiker:1:6"

	scene "scenes/Biker/RadioUsedGeneric03.vcd" predelay ".5,1" //We got some help comin'. Let's get ready!
	scene "scenes/Biker/RadioUsedGeneric05.vcd" predelay ".5,1" //Help's on its way. Let's have some fun while we wait.
	scene "scenes/Biker/RadioUsedGeneric08.vcd" predelay ".5,1" //Help is on the way!
}

	ApplyContext "_auto_Finale:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFinaleTriggeredRooftopBiker

Response L4D1PlayerShotCarNotBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear01.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Goddammit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear02.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Shit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear03.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Ah shit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear04.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Ah hell.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear08.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Ah bullshit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear09.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Dammit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear10.vcd" predelay "0.1,0.7" //Bullshit.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerShotCarNotBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPanicEvent IsBiker IsNotCoughing IsTalk IsTalkBiker SubjectIsNotBiker ChanceToFire60Percent IsCarAlarm IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "Saidremark_caralarm:1:300"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1PlayerShotCarNotBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerShotCarBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/NegativeNoise06.vcd"  //[Improv non-verbal displeasure & frustration sounds]
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionApprehensive03.vcd"  //I don't like ths one damn bit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionNegative05.vcd"  //Shit
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionNegative09.vcd"  //Ahhhhh.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear12.vcd"  //Shit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear14.vcd"  //Ah hell.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear15.vcd"  //Son of a bitch.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear16.vcd"  //Ah bullshit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear17.vcd"  //Dammit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear19.vcd"  //Ah bullshit.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerShotCarBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPanicEvent IsBiker IsNotCoughing IsTalk IsTalkBiker SubjectIsBiker IsCarAlarm IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "Saidremark_caralarm:1:300"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1PlayerShotCarBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear16.vcd"  //Ah bullshit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear17.vcd"  //Dammit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear19.vcd"  //Ah bullshit.

	scene "scenes/Biker/PlayerSuggestHealthSpecific07.vcd"  //Bill, you got a med kit I could have?
	scene "scenes/Biker/PlayerSuggestHealthSpecific11.vcd" odds 5 //Old man, you forget you have a health pack, or you  saving that for me?

	ApplyContext "SaidSpotHealth:1:5,SaidSpot:1:20"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorSpottedGrenadeAutoBiker2
}

// Not Rosetta - Responses
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1EmphaticArriveRunBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/EmphaticRun01.vcd"  //RUN!
	scene "scenes/Biker/EmphaticRun02.vcd"  //RUN!
	scene "scenes/Biker/EmphaticRun03.vcd"  //HOLY SHIT! Run!
	scene "scenes/Biker/EmphaticRun04.vcd"  //LET'S BEAT IT!
	scene "scenes/Biker/EmphaticRun05.vcd"  //RUN!
	scene "scenes/Biker/EmphaticRun06.vcd"  //SHIT! Run!
	scene "scenes/Biker/EmphaticRun09.vcd"  //Get the lead out!
	scene "scenes/Biker/EmphaticRun10.vcd"  //Haul Ass!
}

{
	criteria ConceptEmphaticArriveRun IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker
	Response L4D1EmphaticArriveRunBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerFriendlyFireBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire01.vcd"  //That hurt.
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire02.vcd"  //Dammit! Will you knock it off!
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire03.vcd"  //Will you knock it off!
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire04.vcd"  //Do I look like a target?
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire05.vcd" odds 10 //You know I would appreciate it, IF YOU'D STOP SHOOTING ME.
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire06.vcd"  //Watch where the hell you're shooting.
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire07.vcd"  //Watch where you're shooting!
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire08.vcd"  //Stop. Shooting. Me.
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire09.vcd"  //Hey! Stop. Shooting. Me.
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire10.vcd"  //Watch where you're shooting!
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire11.vcd"  //Don't shoot me!
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire12.vcd"  //Watch where you point that thing
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire13.vcd"  //Dammit! Watch where you're shooting!
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire14.vcd"  //Don't shoot me!
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire15.vcd" odds 8 //Monsters all over the damn place, and you gotta shoot me.
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire16.vcd"  //Quit freaking shooting me!
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire18.vcd" odds 8 //Shoot me again, I'm gonna kick your ass.
	scene "scenes/Biker/FriendlyFire19.vcd" odds 8 //Do that again, and you're gonna be firing that thing outta your ass.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerFriendlyFireBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerFriendlyFire IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsNotFriendlyFire IsNotIncapacitated IsNotOnThirdStrike IsDamageTypeBullet IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker IsNotZombiePresentTank
	ApplyContext "FriendlyFire:1:10"
	Response L4D1PlayerFriendlyFireBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/ToTheRescue02.vcd" predelay "0.75,1.5" //I'm coming!
	scene "scenes/Biker/ToTheRescue03.vcd" predelay "0.75,1.5" //Hang in there buddy, I'm comin.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ToTheRescue04.vcd" predelay "0.75,1.5" //I'm coming for ya!
	scene "scenes/Biker/ToTheRescue05.vcd" predelay "0.75,1.5" //Hang on I'm coming!
	scene "scenes/Biker/ToTheRescue06.vcd" predelay "0.75,1.5" //Hang in there, I'm comin!
	scene "scenes/Biker/ToTheRescue07.vcd" predelay "0.75,1.5" //Hang on, hang on, I'm comin!
	scene "scenes/Biker/ToTheRescue08.vcd" predelay "0.75,1.5" //I heard ya, I'm comin'!
}

}

Response L4D1SurvivorTauntResponseBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah01.vcd"  //All right.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah02.vcd"  //Aw riiiight.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah03.vcd"  //Awesome.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah04.vcd"  //Awesome.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah16.vcd"  //Awesome.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah17.vcd"  //Aw riiiight.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah18.vcd"  //Aw riiiight.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah19.vcd"  //Goddamn right!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah20.vcd"  //Hell yeah!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt01.vcd"  //That's right!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt02.vcd"  //HELL YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt03.vcd"  //OH YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt04.vcd"  //Oh yeah!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt05.vcd"  //[Loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt06.vcd"  //[Loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt07.vcd"  //[Loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt08.vcd"  //YEAH! YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt09.vcd"  //Damn straight!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt10.vcd"  //HELL YEAH!
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorTauntResponseBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerTaunt IsSurvivor IsNotSpeaking IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker //IsNotVersus
	Response L4D1SurvivorTauntResponseBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/IncapacitatedInjury06.vcd"  //[Ahhhh - terrified yell]
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerExertionMinor IsBiker IsNotSpeaking IsWitchPresent SubjectIsNotWitch IsNotSaidWitchChasing IsTalkBiker IsSaidWitchAttacking IsWitchAggro
	ApplyContext "SaidWitchChasing:1:5,TalkBiker:1:2"
	Response PlayerWitchChasingBiker
}

{
	scene "scenes/Biker/FallShort01.vcd"  //Oh no.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionNegative05.vcd"  //Shit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionNegative06.vcd"  //Ah shit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionNegative07.vcd"  //Damnit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionNegative08.vcd"  //Damnit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear01.vcd"  //Goddammit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear06.vcd"  //Crap.
}

{
	criteria IsFaultConcept IsBiker IsFaultWitchHarassment
	ApplyContext "SaidWitchAttacking:1:15,TalkBiker:1:2,SaidWitchStartAttack:1:15"
	Response PlayerWitchStartAttackBiker
}

{
	criteria ConceptWitchStartAttack IsBiker Iswitch_aggro_onBiker
	ApplyContext "WitchAggro:++1"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

Response SurvivorJockeyHurtMajorBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived03.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.066 //[groan]
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived06.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.386 //[groan2]
	scene "scenes/Biker/HurtCritical02.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -2.010 //[Pain noise - loud major pain]
	scene "scenes/Biker/HurtCritical05.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.900 //[Pain noise - loud major pain]
	scene "scenes/Biker/HurtCritical08.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.894 //[Pain noise - loud major pain]
	scene "scenes/Biker/HurtMajor02.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.575 //[Pain noise - huh]
	scene "scenes/Biker/HurtMajor03.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.036 //[Pain noise - oy]
	scene "scenes/Biker/HurtMinor01.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.346 //[Pain noise - short minor pain]
	scene "scenes/Biker/HurtMinor03.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.923 //[Pain noise - short minor pain]
	scene "scenes/Biker/ScreamWhilePounced01.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.749 //GET IT OFF!
	scene "scenes/Biker/ScreamWhilePounced02.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.012 //GET IT OFF! [angry]
	scene "scenes/Biker/ScreamWhilePounced03.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.894 //GET IT OFF
	scene "scenes/Biker/ScreamWhilePounced04.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -1.854 //GET IT OFF GET IT OFF
	scene "scenes/Biker/Shoved05.vcd"  then all commentjockey foo:0 -0.469 //[Reaction to body hits - uhs ahs]
}
Rule SurvivorJockeyHurtMajorBiker
{
	criteria IsSurvivor InPain IsMajorPain IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker SubjectIsJockey IsNotSaidBeenJockeyedBiker IsWorldTalkBiker IsBeingJockeyed
	ApplyContext "SaidBeenJockeyedBiker:1:6,TalkBiker:1:6"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorJockeyHurtMajorBiker
}

Rule SurvivorJockeyHurtMinorBiker
{
	criteria IsSurvivor InPain IsMinorPain IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker SubjectIsJockey IsNotSaidBeenJockeyedBiker IsWorldTalkBiker IsBeingJockeyed
	ApplyContext "SaidBeenJockeyedBiker:1:6,TalkBiker:1:6"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorJockeyHurtMajorBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help01.vcd"  //Help!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help05.vcd"  //Help me!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help06.vcd"  //Help!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help07.vcd"  //Help me!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help12.vcd"  //Help me!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHelp IsBiker IsNotCoughing IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsIncapacitated IsIncappedStarted NotCalledForHelpRecently IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "CalledForHelp:1:15"
	Response L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedBleedingBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help02.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.824 //I need some help over here.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help03.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.157 //I'm in trouble!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help08.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 -1.689 //I'm in some trouble!
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangMiddle04.vcd" then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //I'm not screwing around, I really need some help over here!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help02.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //I need some help over here.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help03.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //I'm in trouble!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help04.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Dammit, I need some help
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help08.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //I'm in some trouble!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help09.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //I need some help over here.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help10.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Hey! I need some help!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help11.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Hey! I need some help!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help13.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //I need a hand over here
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help14.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //I'm in a little trouble over here
	scene "scenes/Biker/Help15.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Dammit, I need some help.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangMiddle04.vcd" odds 25 then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //I'm not screwing around, I really need some help over here!
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart01.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Hey, I could use a hand.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart02.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Get your ass over here and help me up.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart03.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Someone want to help me out here?
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart04.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Hello. I could use a hand.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart05.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Someone wannna give me a hand?
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart08.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Hey, I really need a hand.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart09.vcd"  then any FriendNeedsHelp foo:0 0 //Could use a hand here.
}

{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHelp IsBiker IsNotCoughing IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsIncapacitated IsIncappedBleeding NotCalledForHelpRecently IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "CalledForHelp:1:30"
	Response L4D1PlayerHelpIncappedBleedingBiker
}

{

	scene "scenes/Biker/C6DLC3OTHERBOATS01.vcd"  then Any InfoRemInfo_powerboat foo:0 -0.805 //There's a boat.

	scene "scenes/Biker/C6DLC3OTHERBOATS05.vcd"  then Any InfoRemInfo_powerboat foo:0 -0.645 //That boat?
	scene "scenes/Biker/C6DLC3OTHERBOATS10.vcd"  then Any InfoRemInfo_powerboat foo:0 -0.412 //BOAT!
}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Near Finale
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1SurvivorNearFinaleBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/FinaleAhead01.vcd"  //We're almost there!
	scene "scenes/Biker/FinaleAhead02.vcd"  //We're almost out of here!
	scene "scenes/Biker/FinaleAhead03.vcd"  //Now there's a sight for sore eyes. Looks like we're gonna make it, kids.
	scene "scenes/Biker/FinaleAhead04.vcd"  //Hey, we're almost outta this shithole. I told you I'd get you here.
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorNearFinaleBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNearFinale IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsNotSaidFinaleAhead NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsNotIncapacitated IsWorldTalkBiker AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidFinaleAhead:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorNearFinaleBiker
}

Response SurvivorNearCheckpointBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/SafeSpotAhead06.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 -1.656 //Safe house ahead!
	scene "scenes/Biker/SafeSpotAhead07.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 0.3 //Safe house!
	scene "scenes/Biker/SafeSpotAhead08.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 -1.854 //Safe house, let's go!
	scene "scenes/Biker/SafeSpotAhead03.vcd"  then any SafeSpotAheadResponse foo:0 -1.544 //We're near a safe spot.
}
Rule SurvivorNearCheckpointBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerNearCheckpoint IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsNotSaidSafeSpotAhead IsNotAlone IsNotInCheckpoint IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "SaidSafeSpotAhead:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response SurvivorNearCheckpointBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/SafeSpotAheadReaction07.vcd"  //A-frickin'-men.
}

{
	criteria IsBiker IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkBiker IssuerClose ConceptSafeSpotAheadResponse ChanceToFire30Percent IsWorldTalkBiker AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	Response SafeSpotAheadResponseBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/No12.vcd"  //Negatory.
	scene "scenes/Biker/No13.vcd"  //Uh, no.
	scene "scenes/Biker/No14.vcd"  //No way.
	scene "scenes/Biker/No15.vcd"  //No.
	scene "scenes/Biker/No16.vcd"  //Nope.
	scene "scenes/Biker/No17.vcd"  //No siree bob.
	scene "scenes/Biker/No18.vcd"  //Not a chance.
}

Response PlayerHurrahBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah05.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.254 //We just might make it out of here after all.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah06.vcd"  //We're gonna be okay.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah07.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.211 //I think we're gonna make it.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah08.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.085 //They can't stop us.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah09.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.041 //Nothing can stop us.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah10.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -3.292 //We are unstoppable!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah11.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.446 //YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah12.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.466 //Everybody havin' as much fun as me?
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah13.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.588 //Everyone havin' fun?
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah14.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -3.092 //You know all those monsters? I don't think they're gonna make it.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah15.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -3.228 //We just might make it out of here after all.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah21.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.259 //You guys are all right.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah22.vcd"  //I think we gotta chance
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah23.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.029 //lookin good
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah24.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.322 //Hey, this is just gettin fun.
}
Rule PlayerHurrahBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHurrah IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker 
	Response PlayerHurrahBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah19.vcd"  //Goddamn right!

	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt02.vcd"  //HELL YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt03.vcd"  //OH YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt04.vcd"  //Oh yeah!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt05.vcd"  //[Loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt06.vcd"  //[Loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt07.vcd"  //[Loud, evil laugh]
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt08.vcd"  //YEAH! YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt09.vcd"  //Damn straight!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt10.vcd"  //HELL YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah08.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.085 //They can't stop us.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah09.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.041 //Nothing can stop us.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah10.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -3.292 //We are unstoppable!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah11.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.446 //YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah12.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.466 //Everybody havin' as much fun as me?
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah13.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.588 //Everyone havin' fun?
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah14.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -3.092 //You know all those monsters? I don't think they're gonna make it.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah21.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.259 //You guys are all right.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah23.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -1.029 //lookin good
	scene "scenes/Biker/Hurrah24.vcd"  then Any HurrahAlso foo:0 -2.322 //Hey, this is just gettin fun.
}
Rule GasPourDoneSCBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerPourFinished IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker IsScavenge ScoreDoneSC
	ApplyContext "Talk:1:3"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response GasPourDoneSCBiker
}

Rule L4D1PlayerIncapacitatedInitialBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerIncapacitated IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:2"
	Response L4D1PlayerIncapacitatedInitialBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerKillConfirmationBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation01.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 -0.679 //Got it!
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation02.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 -0.942 //Nailed it!
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation03.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 -0.768 //Down!
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation04.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 -1.328 //That's mine.
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation05.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 -1.205 //Dead!
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation06.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 -0.928 //Popped it!
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation07.vcd"  then Any PlayerNiceShot foo:0 -2.096 //Popped a cap in his ass!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerKillConfirmationBiker
{
	criteria ConceptKilledZombie IsNotCoughing IsBiker SubjectIsNotTank SubjectIsNotAWitch IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsSubjectFar300 ChanceToFire40Percent IsWorldTalkBiker IsNotSpeakingWeight0 _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	Response L4D1PlayerKillConfirmationBiker
}

Response PlayerKillTankConfirmationBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC1_KILLFINALTANK01.vcd"  //I hate tanks.
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC1_KILLFINALTANK02.vcd"  //I hate tanks.
	scene "scenes/Biker/DLC1_KILLFINALTANK03.vcd"  //I hate tanks.
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation01.vcd"  //Got it!
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation02.vcd"  //Nailed it!
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation03.vcd"  //Down!
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation04.vcd"  //That's mine.
	scene "scenes/Biker/KillConfirmation05.vcd"  //Dead!
}
Rule PlayerKillTankConfirmationBiker
{
	criteria ConceptKilledZombie IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker SubjectIsTank IsNotSaidTankDead IsNotAlone IsNotIncapacitated IsRocking IsWorldTalkBiker _auto_NotFinaleStarted
	ApplyContext "SaidTankDead:1:60,TalkBiker:1:5"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response PlayerKillTankConfirmationBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerLockTheDoorCheckPointBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor01.vcd"  //Lock the damn door.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor02.vcd"  //Lock the door.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor03.vcd"  //Lock that door!
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor04.vcd"  //You born in a barn? Lock the goddamn door.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor05.vcd"  //Lock the door.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor06.vcd"  //Lock the freakin' door.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor07.vcd" odds 1 //Personally, I'm happy to keep fighting. But YOU ladies might want to lock the door.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor08.vcd"  //Someone gonna lock that door?
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor09.vcd"  //Get that lock.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor10.vcd"  //Lock the goddamn door.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor11.vcd"  //Would you lock that sucker?
	scene "scenes/Biker/CloseTheDoor12.vcd"  //Keep 'em out! Lock that door!
}

	Response L4D1PlayerLockTheDoorCheckPointBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/HeardWitch07.vcd"  then any PlayerKillThatLight foo:0 -2.669 //There's a Witch around here.

{
	print " " then orator_plane_radio AirportRadioMegaMob foo:0 3.5 //
}

{

	scene "scenes/Biker/EmphaticGo02.vcd"  //MOVE!
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionDisgusted01.vcd"  //Ewwww...
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionDisgusted06.vcd"  //Yech...
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear01.vcd"  //Goddammit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear02.vcd"  //Shit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear08.vcd"  //Ah bullshit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear12.vcd"  //Shit.
}
Rule SurvivorGooedBySpitterBiker
{
	criteria ConceptGooedBySpitter IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsNotSaidGooedBySpitter IsWorldTalkBiker IsNotIncapacitated
	ApplyContext "SaidGooedBySpitter:1:20,TalkBiker:1:3"
	Response SurvivorGooedBySpitterBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/ScreamWhilePounced04.vcd"  //GET IT OFF GET IT OFF

	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangEnd03.vcd"  //I CAN'T HOLD ON - I'M GONNA FALL!
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangEnd04.vcd"  //SHIT...I'M GONNA FALL!
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangEnd05.vcd"  //I'M GONNA FALL!
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangEnd06.vcd"  //I CAN'T HOLD ON!
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangMiddle02.vcd"  //Someone pull me up already!
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangMiddle03.vcd"  //I ain't gonna last hanging here much longer.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangMiddle04.vcd"  //I'm not screwing around, I really need some help over here!
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangMiddle05.vcd"  //For chrissake, pull me up already.

{

	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart02.vcd"  //Get your ass over here and help me up.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart03.vcd"  //Someone want to help me out here?
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart04.vcd"  //Hello. I could use a hand.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart05.vcd"  //Someone wannna give me a hand?
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart06.vcd"  //I'm hanging here.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart07.vcd"  //I ain't hangin' here for fun, get over here and help me.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart08.vcd"  //Hey, I really need a hand.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeHangStart09.vcd"  //Could use a hand here.
}

Response L4D1DoubleDeathBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/DoubleDeathResponse01.vcd" predelay ".5,1.25" // Two left. Allright. We can still do this.
	scene "scenes/Biker/DoubleDeathResponse02.vcd" predelay ".5,1.25" // Just two of us left. Shit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/DoubleDeathResponse03.vcd" predelay ".5,1.25" // You and me gotta find some tougher friends.
}
Rule L4D1DoubleDeathBiker
{
	criteria ConceptSurvivorDied IsNotCoughing SurvivorDiedNearEnough IsSurvivor IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsNotSaidSomeoneDied IsWithOnlyThree IsNotIncapacitated IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "SaidSomeoneDied:1:10"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1DoubleDeathBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/TakeAutoShotgun06.vcd"  //Come to daddy my sweet shotgun.

	scene "scenes/Biker/TakeAutoShotgun08.vcd"  //Huh, this shotgun is more my style.

Response L4D1SurvivorPickupM60Biker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/TakeAutoShotgun04.vcd"  //Those bastards think they're sick now, wait'll they get a taste of this.
	scene "scenes/Biker/TakeAssaultRifle01.vcd"  //This oughtta put the fear a' God into 'em.
	scene "scenes/Biker/TakeAssaultRifle06.vcd"  //This oughtta put the fear a' God into 'em.
}
Rule L4D1SurvivorPickupM60Biker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerPickup IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsPickedUpM60 IsNotSpeaking NotPickedUpItem IsNotInSafeSpot IsNotInStartArea IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "PickedUpItem:1:30"
	Response L4D1SurvivorPickupM60Biker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt01.vcd"  //That's right!

	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt03.vcd"  //OH YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt04.vcd"  //Oh yeah!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt08.vcd"  //YEAH! YEAH!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt09.vcd"  //Damn straight!
	scene "scenes/Biker/Taunt10.vcd"  //HELL YEAH!
}

	applycontexttoworld

}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Vocalizer - Rescue
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1PlayerGettingRevivedBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived01.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.964 //I'm okay.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived02.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.887 //No, no, I'm allright.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived03.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.066 //[groan]
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived04.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -2.269 //Hell if I know.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived05.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -3.925 //Ah, hey, is this my blood?
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived06.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.386 //[groan2]
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived07.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -0.909 //I'll make it.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived08.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -1.634 //I'll live, I'll live.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived09.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -3.072 //Uh, how's my face?
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived10.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -2.372 //I've been better.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived13.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -3.136 //Shit. I hope I don't NEED all that blood.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived14.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -2.912 //Good thing I'm indestructible.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived15.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -3.391 //You... should see the other hundred guys.
	scene "scenes/Biker/GettingRevived16.vcd"  then From ReviveFriendDownFinal foo:0 -2.912 //You think they'll call us heroes someday?
}
Rule L4D1PlayerGettingRevivedBiker
{
	criteria ConceptReviveFriendDown IsNotCoughing  IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker
	Response L4D1PlayerGettingRevivedBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerHealOtherBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOther01.vcd"  //Lemme patch you up.
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOther02.vcd"  //Hold on, lemme patch you up.
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOther03.vcd"  //Stand still, I'm gonna fix ya.
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOther04.vcd"  //Don't move, I'm healin' ya.
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOther05.vcd"  //C'mon. lemme heal ya up.
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOther06.vcd"  //Quit fidgitin' and let me heal ya.
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOther07.vcd"  //Goddamit, quit fussin and let me heal ya.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerHealOtherBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHealingOther IsNotCoughing  IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker NotInIntenseCombat IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:5"
	Response L4D1PlayerHealOtherBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerHealOtherCombatBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOtherCombat01.vcd"  //Hold on! Hold on!
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOtherCombat02.vcd"  //Hold on! I'm gonna patch ya up!
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOtherCombat03.vcd"  //Don't move, I'm healin ya!
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOtherCombat04.vcd"  //Don't go nowhere, I gotta heal ya.
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOtherCombat05.vcd"  //Lemme heal ya!
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOtherCombat06.vcd"  //Hang on. I got ya!
	scene "scenes/Biker/HealOtherCombat07.vcd"  //Stand still, I'm healin' ya!
}
Rule L4D1PlayerHealOtherCombatBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHealingOther IsNotCoughing  IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker InIntenseCombat IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:5"
	Response L4D1PlayerHealOtherCombatBiker
}

Rule L4D1PlayerHealOtherTankBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHealingOther IsNotCoughing  IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsZombiePresentTank IsSaidTankWarn2 IsWorldTalkBiker
	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:5"
	forceweight 30
	Response L4D1PlayerHealOtherCombatBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriend01.vcd"  //Hang on, hang on, I'm here. Relax, I gotcha. Get up. Get up now. We gotta move.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriend02.vcd"  //Woah, I thought you were hosed for sure, but I think I can get you back on your feet.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriend03.vcd"  //Come on, lazy - can't have ya laying around all day. We gotta get moving.  Let me get you up.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriend04.vcd"  //You look like shit, but I think I can get you up on your feet enough to keep moving.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriend05.vcd" odds 2 //C'mon, let's get you on your feet. You look pretty messed up, but that might help you out a little if you know what I mean.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriend06.vcd"  //Don't worry, don't worry, we all go down sometime. Lemme get you up.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriend07.vcd"  //Didn't think you were gettin' back up.
	scene "scenes/Biker/revivefrienda01.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.977 // You okay?
	scene "scenes/Biker/revivefrienda02.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.864 // How d'ya feel?
	scene "scenes/Biker/revivefrienda03.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.849 // Can you make it?
	scene "scenes/Biker/revivefrienda04.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -1.056 // You gonna make it?
	scene "scenes/Biker/revivefrienda05.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.992 // How bad are you?
	scene "scenes/Biker/revivefrienda07.vcd" then subject ReviveFriendDown foo:0 -0.863 // How ya doin'?
}
Rule L4D1PlayerReviveFriendBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerReviveFriend IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker NotInIntenseCombat _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:2"
	Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendCriticalBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveCriticalFriend01.vcd"  //I gotcha, I gotcha. Man, you took a real beatin'. We gotta find you some first aid, cuz you go down like this again and it's over.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveCriticalFriend02.vcd"  //No worries - I gotcha, I gotcha. Man, you took a real beatin'. We gotta find you some first aid, cuz you go down like this again and it's over.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveCriticalFriend03.vcd"  //Okay, okay.  Come on.  Man, you are on death's door.  We gotta get you some first aid, cuz you go down like this again and it's over.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveCriticalFriend04.vcd"  //Ah shit, I can't lie, you are messed up bad. We gotta get you some first aid, cuz you go down like this again and it's over.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveCriticalFriend05.vcd"  //I can help you up, but you ain't gonna last.  We gotta get you some first aid, cuz you go down like this again and it's over.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveCriticalFriend06.vcd"  //Okay, let's get you - Oh, man, they really tore you up.  We gotta get you some first aid,  cuz you go down like this again and it's over.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveCriticalFriend07.vcd"  //I can get you up, but oh shit, We gotta get you some first aid, cuz you go down like this again and it's over.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveCriticalFriend08.vcd"  //Relax, I gotcha.  But, shit, we gotta get you some first aid, cuz you go down like this again and it's over.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerReviveFriendCriticalBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerReviveFriendCritical IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker NotInIntenseCombat _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:5"
	Response L4D1PlayerReviveFriendCriticalBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendLoud11.vcd"  //Get your ass up, let's go!

Response L4D1ReviveFriendDownFinalBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB01.vcd"  //Up and at 'em.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB02.vcd"  //Come on up!
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB03.vcd"  //Up ya go.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB04.vcd"  //You'll be okay.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB05.vcd"  //I got ya.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB06.vcd"  //Up we go.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB07.vcd"  //Hell, you're fine.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB08.vcd"  //It don't look bad.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB09.vcd"  //Come on up.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB10.vcd"  //Let's move!
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB11.vcd"  //You're fine.
}
Rule L4D1ReviveFriendDownFinalBiker
{
	criteria ConceptReviveFriendDownFinal IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker IsNotReviveInterrupt
	Response L4D1ReviveFriendDownFinalBiker
}

	scene "scenes/Biker/ReviveFriendB12.vcd" // Let's get to it, Louis.
}

Response PlayerLedgeSaveBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeSave01.vcd"  //Come on, don't worry, I gotcha.  Up you go.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeSave02.vcd"  //You think I was gonna let you just hang around all day?  Get your ass up here.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeSave03.vcd"  //You think I was gonna let you just hang around all day?  Get your ass up here.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeSave04.vcd"  //Come on, don't worry, I gotcha.  Up you go.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeSave05.vcd"  //You ain't gonna fall, I gotcha. Quit blubberin' ya little baby, now get your ass back up here.
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeSave06.vcd"  //You ain't gonna fall, I gotcha. Get yer ass up here!
	scene "scenes/Biker/LedgeSave07.vcd"  //You ain't gonna fall, I gotcha. Quit blubberin and get back up here.
}
Rule PlayerLedgeSaveBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerLedgeSave IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:5"
	Response PlayerLedgeSaveBiker
}

Rule L4D1PlayerLedgeSaveCriticalBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerLedgeSaveCritical IsNotCoughing  IsBiker IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "TalkBiker:1:5"
	Response PlayerLedgeSaveBiker
}


//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Vocalizer Convo
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1PlayerAirportIntroBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/WorldAirport0102.vcd" then self IntroEnd foo:0 0.1 //Working plane means working airport. I say we head there.
	scene "scenes/Biker/WorldAirport0104.vcd" then self IntroEnd foo:0 0.1 //That plane's headed right for the airport. I say we head there too.
	scene "scenes/Biker/WorldAirport0106.vcd"  then TeenGirl IntroAirport01zb foo:0 -4.312 //I sure as hell wouldn't mind flyin' outta here. Let's head to the airport.
	scene "scenes/Biker/WorldAirport0107.vcd" then self IntroEnd foo:0 0.1 //That plane's headed for the airport and the airport ain't far from here. If nobody's got a better idea, I say we head for the airport too.
	scene "scenes/Biker/WorldAirport0114.vcd"  then TeenGirl IntroAirport01zb foo:0 -4.612 //That plane's headed right for the airport. I say we head there too.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerAirportIntroBiker
{
	criteria ConceptIntroAirport IsBiker IsNotSaidCXM1Intro IsNotAlone AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "CXM1Intro:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1PlayerAirportIntroBiker
}

Response L4D1PlayerAirportIntrobcBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/WorldAirport0513.vcd" then self IntroEnd foo:0 0.1 //I hate planes.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerAirportIntrobcBiker
{
	criteria ConceptIntroAirport01bc IsBiker AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	Response L4D1PlayerAirportIntrobcBiker
}

{
	scene "scenes/Biker/WorldFarmHouseIntro01.vcd"  then any IntroFarm4 foo:0 -5.439 //I heard the military's got a safe zone north of here. We just gotta follow the train tracks.
	scene "scenes/Biker/WorldFarmHouseIntro05.vcd"  then any IntroFarm4 foo:0 -7.424 //We ain't gonna survive on our own forever. I heard the military's got a safe zone north of here. We just gotta follow the train tracks.
}

Response PlayerShotGasCanBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionNegative05.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Shit
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionNegative07.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Damnit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/ReactionNegative08.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Damnit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear03.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Ah shit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear08.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Ah bullshit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear17.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Dammit.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear18.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Bullshit.
}
Rule PlayerShotGasCanBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerShotGasCan IsBiker IsNotSaidPlayerShotGasCan IsScavenge
	ApplyContext "SaidPlayerShotGasCan1:10"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response PlayerShotGasCanBiker
}


//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Vocalizer Heal
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response L4D1PlayerCoverMeHealBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe01.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me!
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe02.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Get my back.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe03.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Watch my back
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe04.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover me!
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe05.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Get my back.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe06.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Watch my back
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe08.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" odds 2 //Watch my back! But don't stare at my ass.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe09.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" odds 5 //Watch my back! But don't stare at my ass.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe10.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Cover my ass.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe11.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Healing, cover me.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe12.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Wait up, I'm healing.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe13.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //Hold on, gotta heal.
	scene "scenes/Biker/CoverMe14.vcd" predelay ".2,.5" //I'm healing.
}
Rule L4D1PlayerCoverMeHealBiker
{
	criteria ConceptPlayerHealing IsNotCoughing IsBiker IsNotAskedForCover IsTalk IsTalkBiker IsNotAlone IsWorldTalkBiker _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "AskForCover:1:30"
	Response L4D1PlayerCoverMeHealBiker
}

// Volcalize
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Response AutoPlayerLostCallBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/LostCall01.vcd"  //Hello
	scene "scenes/Biker/LostCall04.vcd"  //Is anyone there?
	scene "scenes/Biker/LostCall05.vcd"  //Marco!
	scene "scenes/Biker/LostCall08.vcd"  //Hello? Where dija go?
}
Rule AutoPlayerLostCallBiker
{
	criteria ConceptTalkIdle IsBiker IsClosestSurvivorFar3000 IsNotAlone IsNotSaidPlayerLostCall _auto_NotNoLostCall IsNotSpeakingWeight0 _auto_NotSpottedVehicle
	ApplyContext "SaidPlayerLostCall:1:50"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response AutoPlayerLostCallBiker
}

}

	scene "scenes/Biker/SpotWeapons04.vcd"  //Weapon's over here!

}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Spotted Melee Weapons (Generic Lines)
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Response SurvivorSpottedMeleeWeaponBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/SpotWeapons01.vcd"  //Weapons here!
	scene "scenes/Biker/SpotWeapons02.vcd"  //Weapon's over here!
	scene "scenes/Biker/SpotWeapons02.vcd"  //Weapon's over here!
	scene "scenes/Biker/SpotWeapons04.vcd"  //Weapon's over here!
	scene "scenes/Biker/SpotWeapons04.vcd"  //Weapon's over here!
	scene "scenes/Biker/SpotWeapons05.vcd"  //We got weapons over here.
	scene "scenes/Biker/SpotWeapons05.vcd"  //We got weapons over here.
}

}

Response L4D1C14M2RadioDestroyedBiker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear15.vcd"  //Son of a bitch.
	scene "scenes/Biker/Swear17.vcd"  //Dammit.
}

{
	criteria ConceptC14M2RadioDestroyed IsBiker IsNotIncapacitated IsTalkBiker IsWorldTalkBiker AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival _auto_IsTalkingBiker
	Response L4D1C14M2RadioDestroyedBiker
}

Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatC14M2Biker
{
	scene "scenes/Biker/ArriveBoatInitial01.vcd" predelay "12" then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 -14.601 //Our boat's here, all aboard!
	scene "scenes/Biker/ArriveBoatInitial02.vcd" predelay "12" then any EmphaticArriveRun foo:0 -14.601 //Our boat's here! Let's go!
}

{
	criteria ConceptFinalVehicleSpotted IsBiker IsLastStand2 _auto_IsFinaleStarted
	ApplyContext "_auto_TimerLockA:1:10,_auto_TimerLockBiker:1:30,_auto_Finale:2:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response L4D1SurvivorFinalVehicleSpottedBoatC14M2Biker
}

}

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Generic rules to keep track of contexts for all maps (Unless there's a seperate rule for special cases)
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Rule SafeRoomStartBiker
{
	criteria ConceptTalkIdle IsBiker IsInStartArea AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival _auto_NotSafeRoomStart
	ApplyContext "Talk:1:45,_auto_SafeRoomStart:1:0,_auto_SafeRoomQuiet:1:5"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

{
	criteria ConceptIntroEnd IsBiker FromIsBiker IsNotSaidLeavingSafeArea AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival
	ApplyContext "Talk:0:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NoResponse
}

	ApplyContext "SaidLeavingSafeArea:1:0,Talk:0:0"

}

	ApplyContext "SaidLeavingSafeArea:1:0,Talk:0:0"

}
